name: Until I Leave
description:
Experience a story about anxiety as you struggle to escape the maze that is your own home...

This game was made in under 2 days for the Brackeys Game Jam as I started late. Unfortunately, the game took too long to build so I couldn't submit it in time. Since then I've just been fixing bugs so there shouldn't be any issues, hopefully.

Controls:

A / D  or Right / Left Arrow Keys = Move

Space = Jump

At the end of each level when the only thing on screen is text, press any key to continue.
